LG 22LN4125 22 inch (55 cm) LED HD-Ready TV

COMPARE
Shortlist
About LG

1. Trusted Brand

2. A giant in electronics, LG has been making smartphones for a long time. Popular for its "G" series, the Korean firm is credited with launching the world's first dual-core phone, first curved phone and has partnered with Google on multiple occassions to deliver Nexus devices.

3. LG has over 700 service centres in India. Toll Free Number: 18001809999

LG 22LN4125 22 inch (55 cm) LED HD-Ready TV Specifications

General
Brand LG
Model 22LN4125 22 inch (55 cm) LED HD-Ready TV
Warranty 1 Year
Box Contents Television, Remote Control, User Manual, Stand, 2 AA Size Batteries and Warranty Card
Display
Type LED
Size(Diagonal) 22 Inch (55.88 cm)
Resolution HD ready, 1366 x 768 Pixels
LED Backlight Type Ultra Slim LED
Aspect Ratio 16 : 9
Horizontal Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
Vertical Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
3D TV No
Curved TV No
Ultra Slim TV Yes
Other Display Features Triple XD Engine, Eco Sensor
Physical Design
Weight Without Stand 3.2 Kg
Weight With Stand 3.4 Kg
Dimensions With Stand(WxDxH) 513 x 362 x 140 mm
Dimensions Without Stand(WxDxH) 513 x 320 x 63 mm
Stand Shape Tabletop
Stand Material Plastic
Stand Weight 0.2 Kg
Stand Colour Black
Video
Analog TV Reception Formats PAL, NTSC, SECAM
Video Formats Supported 3GP, AVI, FLV, MKV, MP4, MPEG
Image Formats Supported JPEG, PNG
Video Signals HDMI, Component
Audio
Sound Type 5.1 Surround
Sound Technology Dolby Digital Decoder
Audio Formats Supported AC3(Dolby Digital), MP3, WAV, WMA
No. of Speakers 2
Output per Speaker 5 W
Total Speaker Output 10 W
Speaker Frequency Range 50 - 60 Hz
Other Smart Audio Features Auto volume leveller: Balance
Connectivity /Ports
USB Ports 1(Side)
USB Supports Audio, Video, Image
HDMI Ports 1(Rear)
Headphone/Speaker output ports 1
RF Input(Analog Coaxial) Ports 1
NFC Ports No
Smart TV Features
Smart TV No
Wifi Present No
Facebook and Social Media Integration No
Voice Recognition No
Other Smart Features Easylink (HDMI-CEC), Fluctuation protection
Remote
Remote Type RF (Radio frequency)
Universal Control Present No
Touch Controls Present No
Internet Access No
Cell Requirement 2 AA
Power Supply
Voltage Requirement 110 - 240 V
Frequency Requirement 50 - 60 Hz
Power Consmption Running 27 W
Power Consmption Standby 0.5 W
Power Saving Mode Yes
